name: part_011
file: tmp_【 #百鬼あやめ7周年新衣装3D 】百鬼あやめ７周年記念ライブ  ～天女繚華～ 【百鬼あやめ⧸ホロライブ】 [uRa-uLMea7w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Ayame talks about the special stage setup and interacts with the audience.
Ayame reveals and introduces her new original song, "Hana Fubuki".
Performance of the new song 'Hana Fubuki'.

subtitles.original: こちら上に上がってきたんですけれども、
subtitles.english: I've come up here,

subtitles.original: ま、上でね、何をやるのかと、
subtitles.english: and, well, you might wonder what I'll do up here.

subtitles.original: うすうすちょっと気づいてるんじゃないのかなとは思うんですけれども！
subtitles.english: I think some of you might have an inkling, but still!

subtitles.original: 何かわかるかな？みんな。
subtitles.english: Do you know what it is? Everyone.

subtitles.original: 教えて、教えて、教えて！
subtitles.english: Tell me, tell me, tell me!

subtitles.original: みんな何だと思う？何だと思う？
subtitles.english: What do you think it is? What do you think?

subtitles.original: お、何か... お、お、お餅？（笑）
subtitles.english: Oh, something... Oh, mochi? (Laughs)

subtitles.original: お、遊んでますねー、お、なんと！
subtitles.english: Oh, you're just playing around. Well!

subtitles.original: はい、こちら！なんとこちらです！ドドン！
subtitles.english: Yes, here! It's this! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: 新曲『花吹雪』でーす！やったー！
subtitles.english: It's my new song, "Hana Fubuki"! Yay!

subtitles.original: いや、もうだいぶ長らくお待たせしたと思うんですけれども、
subtitles.english: I think I've kept you waiting for quite a long time,

subtitles.original: 余のオリジナル曲の新しいのはいつだ？みたいな感じで待っていたかと思うんですけど、
subtitles.english: wondering when my next original song would be out.

subtitles.original: えー、こちら、作詞作曲Vellさんに書いていただきました！
subtitles.english: This one was written and composed by Vell-san!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: テーマはですね、『可憐な歌声』×『和風ロック』！
subtitles.english: The theme is "lovely vocals" x "Japanese-style rock"!

subtitles.original: 可愛いだけじゃない、一味違うオリジナルソングとなっております！
subtitles.english: It's an original song that's not just cute, but something a bit different!

subtitles.original: はい、この綺麗で可憐で、重厚な和風ロックとなっておりますので、
subtitles.english: It's a beautiful, lovely, yet heavy Japanese-style rock song,

subtitles.original: メロディとか歌詞もこだわり抜いて、磨き上げていただいた楽曲となっておりますので、
subtitles.english: and since the melody and lyrics have been refined with great care,

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、皆さん聴いてください！
subtitles.english: everyone, please, please listen to it!

subtitles.original: 9月4日、本日の0時からですね、各種音楽サイトでリリースされるので、
subtitles.english: It's being released on various music sites starting today, September 4th, at midnight,

subtitles.original: ぜひ聴いてください！聴いてね！いっぱい聴いてね！
subtitles.english: so please listen to it! Listen to it, okay? Listen to it a lot!

subtitles.original: はい、それでは皆さん、大変長らくお待たせいたしました。
subtitles.english: All right then, everyone, thank you so much for waiting.

subtitles.original: 最後はこの新曲『花吹雪』を送らせていただきたいと思います！
subtitles.english: Lastly, I'd like to perform this new song, "Hana Fubuki"!

subtitles.original: 感想なども、この衣装もステージと一緒にポストしてください！たくさんポストしてねー！
subtitles.english: Please post your impressions, along with the outfit and stage! Post a lot, okay!

subtitles.original: 最後にはメン限パートで、ちょっと衣装のお写真撮ったり詳しいお話もしたり、
subtitles.english: And at the very end, in the members-only part, we'll take photos and talk in detail,

subtitles.original: ミニライブもありますので、そちらの方もぜひぜひ見に来てくれたら嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: and there's a mini-live too, so I'd be happy if you came to see that as well!

subtitles.original: はい、それでは聴いてください。『花吹雪』！
subtitles.english: All right then, please listen to it. "Hana Fubuki"!

subtitles.original: 共に散る　宿命なら
subtitles.english: If it's our destiny to fall together,

subtitles.original: 派手に散りましょう
subtitles.english: let us fall in style.

subtitles.original: 花吹雪
subtitles.english: A flurry of falling petals.

subtitles.original: ひらひら　舞い落ちる空
subtitles.english: Fluttering down from the sky,

subtitles.original: とうに散った　うたかたの夢
subtitles.english: the ephemeral dreams that have long since fallen.

subtitles.original: 千の花は　麗しく咲く
subtitles.english: A thousand flowers bloom beautifully,

subtitles.original: 叶う逢瀬は　刹那
subtitles.english: a tryst fulfilled is but a fleeting moment.

subtitles.original: 艶やかに舞い
subtitles.english: Dancing elegantly,

subtitles.original: 蝶の儚き命
subtitles.english: the butterfly's short-lived life.

subtitles.original: するり堕ちる　今宵は何処
subtitles.english: Slipping away, where to tonight?

subtitles.original: 天つ風揺れ
subtitles.english: The heavenly winds swaying.

subtitles.original: 狂おしく　今咲き誇れ
subtitles.english: Bloom in full glory now, distractedly.

subtitles.original: 共に散る　宿命なら
subtitles.english: If it's our destiny to fall together,

subtitles.original: 光満ちた　舞台で舞え
subtitles.english: dance on the stage filled with light.

subtitles.original: 闇を裂く　旋律は
subtitles.english: The melody that rends the darkness,

subtitles.original: ゆらりと薫る
subtitles.english: fragrantly wafts.

subtitles.original: 夢を咲かせましょう
subtitles.english: Let us make our dreams bloom.

subtitles.original: 花吹雪
subtitles.english: A flurry of falling petals.

subtitles.original: くらくら　燃ゆるは焔
subtitles.english: Dizzying, the burning flames,

subtitles.original: 遠く咲いた　明くる日の夢
subtitles.english: the dream of the next day that bloomed afar.

subtitles.original: 正か否か　惑わずに往こう
subtitles.english: Whether right or wrong, let's go without hesitation,

subtitles.original: 過去の痛みを胸に
subtitles.english: with the pain of the past in our hearts.

subtitles.original: 誰そ彼に
subtitles.english: In the twilight,

subtitles.original: 祈りをひとつ
subtitles.english: a single prayer.

subtitles.original: 涙の川を
subtitles.english: Upon the river of tears,

subtitles.original: 穿つ声響く
subtitles.english: a piercing voice echoes.

subtitles.original: 慎ましく　ただ進むだけ
subtitles.english: I will simply move forward, modestly.

subtitles.original: 茜さす　空の果て
subtitles.english: At the edge of the madder-red sky,

subtitles.original: 褪せた過去の　憧れを見る
subtitles.english: I see the faded yearnings of the past.

subtitles.original: 澄み渡る　静寂に
subtitles.english: In the clear silence,

subtitles.original: 未来を繋ぐ
subtitles.english: connect the future.

subtitles.original: 答え求むれど
subtitles.english: Though I seek an answer,

subtitles.original: 術も無し
subtitles.english: there is no way.

subtitles.original: 星の降る　夜明けまで
subtitles.english: Until the dawn when stars fall,

subtitles.original: 続く歌よ　彼方へ届け
subtitles.english: O continuing song, reach far away.

subtitles.original: 湧き上がる　情熱が
subtitles.english: The welling passion,

subtitles.original: 世界を照らす
subtitles.english: will illuminate the world.

subtitles.original: 共に散る　宿命なら
subtitles.english: If it's our destiny to fall together,
